channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Denmark postal service to stop delivering letters
item.description: The decision will end 400 years of the company's letter service, and postboxes will disappear from June.

item.title: What does the Department of Education do - and can Trump dismantle it?
item.description: The president has pledged to eliminate the federal agency that oversees the US education system.

item.title: What to know about potential cuts to Medicaid and how it could impact you
item.description: CBS News business analyst Jill Schlesinger joins "CBS Mornings" to discuss potential cuts to Medicaid. As Congress works on a federal budget, Republic...

item.title: Jobs lost in every state and lifesaving cures not discovered: Possible impacts of research cuts
item.description: Ripple effects of the Trump administration’s crackdown on U.S. medical research promise to reach every corner of America.

item.title: Attacks on Ukraine continue as U.S. pauses intelligence sharing, military aid
item.description: The Trump administration has paused intelligence sharing with Ukraine following the suspension of military aid. Meanwhile, attacks in Ukraine continue...

item.title: Layoffs and potential closures of key facilities raise worries about NOAA's future

item.title: High winds, snow and rain wreak havoc on the Midwest
item.description: Wind gusts up to 70 mph, heavy snow and torrential rain created hazardous conditions from the Midwest to the East Coast. The system dumped more than a...

item.title: US 'destroying' world order, Ukraine's ambassador to UK says
item.description: Valerii Zaluzhnyi's comments come amid an apparent cooling of tensions between Kyiv and Washington.

item.title: Did tariffs contribute to the Great Depression? Here's what to know

item.title: Jack Daniel's hits out at Canada pulling US alcohol
item.description: Some Canadian provinces have removed US-made alcohol from shelves in response to US tariffs.

item.title: Trump has dropped a high-profile abortion case in Idaho. Here’s what that means
General's arrest violates South Sudan peace deal, opposition says
item.description: Two close allies of the vice-president, a bitter rival of the president, are arrested.

item.title: Steve Carell announces that a charity will fund proms for students affected by LA fires
item.description: The children's organization, Alice's Kids, will cover the costs for approximately 800 students to enjoy prom night.

item.title: Veterans fired from federal jobs say they feel betrayed, including some who voted for Trump
